name: Steal from Witch
description:
Description

A goblin but don't have ears and nose because they cut by orge. This goblin need heal potion for heal eras and nose. Then our adventure begins. Goblin goes to Witch's dungeon to steal heal potions. w, a, s, d to move. After you heal sense. Goblin sense are ready to use. For sense press 1, 2, 3 buttons.

This game made by me only.
